website_summaries.verdict: Nike’s Hyperdiamond baseball cleats are made to last, and they are as comfortable as they are stylish.
pros: 12 cleats per shoe for superior traction
cons: These are only available in red and black

customer_reviews.title: Can always depend on Amazon coming to the rescue.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her baseball shoes. A Perfect fit. Two thumbs up! 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Rigoberto Delapaz

customer_reviews.title: More neon orange in color than red
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cleat, but didn't realize it would be neon orange (really weren't sure what color "Persian violet" was). The computer image looked a bit more on the red side which is what we were hoping for to go with school colors. Great cleat though with nice construction. And if you like neon this is cool. Return shipping is buyer's responsibility. So be sure to get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Mom

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat stiff .
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these a half size bigger . They seem somewhat stiff . Hopefully they break in well . My daughters initial reaction was they hurt her feet . Hoping for the best as she wears them more .
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: A little tight fitting. But I think once worn several times and stretched out a little they will be better. At dunhams for $30.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Swing BATTER BATTER!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. My daughter plays fastpitch softball and she adores them! Great price! Qrrived quickly! Perfect for any softball sweetheart
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great shows for my 8 year old. Fits true to size
customer_reviews.author: B Thompson

customer_reviews.title: great shoes to buy although they were cheaper if i ...
customer_reviews.text: great shoes to buy although they were cheaper if i would have gone direct to Dicks (where these were shipped from) $20 cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wyandt

customer_reviews.title: Fun and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these we have bought. They are comfortable, functional, and fun.
customer_reviews.author: R. Camp

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size up
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 1 I thought I needed to exchange but a 1 fit perfect my son normally wears a 12 or 13 in sneakers
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schell

customer_reviews.title: Girls are gonna love them!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this pair.. Happy we found them and in pink too
customer_reviews.author: Kaiola & Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her cleats. "It does the job!" she says.
customer_reviews.author: Rosella Keene

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and Light shoe for tiny leg
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe...fits perfectly for my kid, hope will increase my kid baseball performance 💪🏻
customer_reviews.author: Iman Susilo

product_meta.title: Nike Kids Hyperdiamond 2.5 Keystone Baseball Cleat, Black/White/Persian Violet/Infrared, 5 Big Kid
